item.title: ChatGPT Command
item.description:
ChatGPT Command

紀錄 chatgpt 用法

Act as linux terminal

1I want you to act as a Linux terminal, 
2I will type commands and you will reply with what the terminal should show. 
3I want you to reply with the terminal output inside a unique code block and nothing else.
4do not write explanations.
5do not type commands unless I instruct you to do so.
6When I need to tell you something in English I will do so by putting text inside curly brackets {something like this}.
7my first command is pwd.

1lynx https://medium.com/@neonforge/learn-how-to-use-the-magic-of-terraform-locals-step-by-step-guide-68fd3fb776
